title: What Is Art? | StreetSmart
description: In this video, Max Fosh explores the concept of art by conducting a social experiment on the streets of London.
summary: Max Fosh sets up a booth on the street asking people to submit their random objects as art pieces and then evaluates them with a serious art critic.
payoff: The payoff comes when the serious art critic evaluates everyday objects like a banana and a sock as if they were high art, highlighting the subjectivity of the art world and the absurdity of some modern art interpretations.
